summary: Four children (the Swallows) on holiday in the Lake District sail on their own to an island and start a war with rival children (the Amazons). In the meantime, a mysterious man on a houseboat accuses them of a crime they did not commit.
cast: Bobby McCulloch|Dane Hughes|Kelly Macdonald|Abbie Glozier|Megan Glozier|Teddie-Rose Malleson-Allen|Orla Hill|Andrew Scott|Dan Renton Skinner|Rafe Spall|Harry Enfield|Jessica Hynes|Fenella Woolgar|Jack Ibbotson|Richard Bremmer|Neil Bell|Seren Hawkes|Hannah Jayne Thorp|John Henshaw|Elizabeth Berrington|Glen Goodey|Julien Evans|John Russell|Chris Anastasi|Jamie Darlington|Paul Redfern|Nicola Simonds|Phil Tillott|Richard Varley|Sophie Wardlow
title: Golondrinas y amazonas
